nodes.text: Dynast was the title used to describe the leader of a Noghri clan. They usually met in the Grand Dukha to meet and discuss issues involving the whole of Honoghr, as well as pay tribute to the Galactic Empire when Honoghr was under Imperial control.
It is unknown what duties or powers the dynast and the Maitrakh shared but they seemed to hold some authority over the Maitrakhs.
When Leia Organa went to speak to the dynasts in the Grand Dukha, there were thirteen middle-aged male dynasts.
